verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, put forth <S%H2330><s%> <S%H8798><s%> a riddle <S%H2420><s%>, and speak <S%H4911><s%> <S%H8798><s%> a parable <S%H4912><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>;

And say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; A great <S%H1419><s%> eagle <S%H5404><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> wings <S%H3671><s%>, longwinged <S%H83><s%> <S%H750><s%>, full <S%H4392><s%> of feathers <S%H5133><s%>, which had divers colours <S%H7553><s%>, came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the highest branch <S%H6788><s%> of the cedar <S%H730><s%>:

He cropped off <S%H6998><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the top <S%H7218><s%> of his young twigs <S%H3242><s%>, and carried <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it into a land <S%H776><s%> of traffick <S%H3667><s%>; he set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it in a city <S%H5892><s%> of merchants <S%H7402><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

He took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> also of the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, and planted <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it in a fruitful <S%H2233><s%> field <S%H7704><s%>; he placed <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it by great <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>, and set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it as a willow tree <S%H6851><s%>.

And it grew <S%H6779><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and became a spreading <S%H5628><s%> <S%H8802><s%> vine <S%H1612><s%> of low <S%H8217><s%> stature <S%H6967><s%>, whose branches <S%H1808><s%> turned <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8800><s%> toward him, and the roots <S%H8328><s%> thereof were under him: so it became a vine <S%H1612><s%>, and brought forth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> branches <S%H905><s%>, and shot <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> forth sprigs <S%H6288><s%>.

There was also another <S%H259><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> eagle <S%H5404><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> wings <S%H3671><s%> and many <S%H7227><s%> feathers <S%H5133><s%>: and, behold, this vine <S%H1612><s%> did bend <S%H3719><s%> <S%H8804><s%> her roots <S%H8328><s%> toward him, and shot forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8765><s%> her branches <S%H1808><s%> toward him, that he might water <S%H8248><s%> <S%H8687><s%> it by the furrows <S%H6170><s%> of her plantation <S%H4302><s%>.

It was planted <S%H8362><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in a good <S%H2896><s%> soil <S%H7704><s%> by great <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>, that it might bring forth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> branches <S%H6057><s%>, and that it might bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8800><s%> fruit <S%H6529><s%>, that it might be a goodly <S%H155><s%> vine <S%H1612><s%>.

Say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thou, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Shall it prosper <S%H6743><s%> <S%H8799><s%>? shall he not pull up <S%H5423><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the roots <S%H8328><s%> thereof, and cut off <S%H7082><s%> <S%H8779><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof, that it wither <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8804><s%>? it shall wither <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in all the leaves <S%H2964><s%> of her spring <S%H6780><s%>, even without great <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H2220><s%> or many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> to pluck it up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8800><s%> by the roots <S%H8328><s%> thereof.

Yea, behold, being planted <S%H8362><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, shall it prosper <S%H6743><s%> <S%H8799><s%>? shall it not utterly <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8800><s%> wither <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, when the east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> toucheth <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it? it shall wither <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the furrows <S%H6170><s%> where it grew <S%H6780><s%>.
Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%> now to the rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, Know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ye not what these things mean? tell <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%> them, Behold, the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, and hath taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> thereof, and the princes <S%H8269><s%> thereof, and led <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them with him to Babylon <S%H894><s%>;

And hath taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the king's <S%H4410><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%>, and made <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with him, and hath taken <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> an oath <S%H423><s%> of him: he hath also taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the mighty <S%H352><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>:

That the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> might be base <S%H8217><s%>, that it might not lift itself up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8692><s%>, but that by keeping <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of his covenant <S%H1285><s%> it might stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

But he rebelled <S%H4775><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against him in sending <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8800><s%> his ambassadors <S%H4397><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, that they might give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him horses <S%H5483><s%> and much <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>. Shall he prosper <S%H6743><s%> <S%H8799><s%>? shall he escape <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8735><s%> that doeth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> such things? or shall he break <S%H6565><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%>, and be delivered <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8738><s%> ?

As I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, surely in the place <S%H4725><s%> where the king <S%H4428><s%> dwelleth that made him king <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8688><s%>, whose oath <S%H423><s%> he despised <S%H959><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and whose covenant <S%H1285><s%> he brake <S%H6565><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, even with him in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> he shall die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Neither shall Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> with his mighty <S%H1419><s%> army <S%H2428><s%> and great <S%H7227><s%> company <S%H6951><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for him in the war <S%H4421><s%>, by casting up <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8800><s%> mounts <S%H5550><s%>, and building <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8800><s%> forts <S%H1785><s%>, to cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8687><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> persons <S%H5315><s%>:

Seeing he despised <S%H959><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the oath <S%H423><s%> by breaking <S%H6565><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%>, when, lo, he had given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and hath done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all these things, he shall not escape <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; As I live <S%H2416><s%>, surely mine oath <S%H423><s%> that he hath despised <S%H959><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and my covenant <S%H1285><s%> that he hath broken <S%H6331><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, even it will I recompense <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon his own head <S%H7218><s%>.

And I will spread <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my net <S%H7568><s%> upon him, and he shall be taken <S%H8610><s%> <S%H8738><s%> in my snare <S%H4686><s%>, and I will bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him to Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and will plead <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8738><s%> with him there for his trespass <S%H4603><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that he hath trespassed <S%H4604><s%> against me.

And all his fugitives <S%H4015><s%> with all his bands <S%H102><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and they that remain <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8737><s%> shall be scattered <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8735><s%> toward all winds <S%H7307><s%>: and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that I the YY <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> it.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; I will also take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of the highest branch <S%H6788><s%> of the high <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8802><s%> cedar <S%H730><s%>, and will set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it; I will crop off <S%H6998><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from the top <S%H7218><s%> of his young twigs <S%H3127><s%> a tender one <S%H7390><s%>, and will plant <S%H8362><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it upon an high <S%H1364><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> and eminent <S%H8524><s%> <S%H8803><s%>:

In the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the height <S%H4791><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> will I plant <S%H8362><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it: and it shall bring forth <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8804><s%> boughs <S%H6057><s%>, and bear <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> fruit <S%H6529><s%>, and be a goodly <S%H117><s%> cedar <S%H730><s%>: and under it shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all fowl <S%H6833><s%> of every wing <S%H3671><s%>; in the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of the branches <S%H1808><s%> thereof shall they dwell <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And all the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that I the YY <S%H3068><s%> have brought down <S%H8213><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the high <S%H1364><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>, have exalted <S%H1361><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the low <S%H8217><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>, have dried <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8689><s%> up the green <S%H3892><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>, and have made the dry <S%H3002><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> to flourish <S%H6524><s%> <S%H8689><s%>: I the YY <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> and have done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it.
